name: Far Cnight
detailed_description:
Game in the genre action platformer. The game begins with the fact that you appear in an unknown place for you, being in great danger. During the passage of the game, you will meet different opponents, traps and so on. The mechanics of the game - fight, defend yourself, run fairly comfortable and interesting. Beautiful music, an interesting story, fascinating design - all this you will find in our game
The basic mechanics of the game is a combination of strokes and the correct use of theprotection. You begin a weak knight, gradually increasing your skills and buying new items. Enemies as well as you become stronger. There are several bosses in the game. The game has a variety of levels, ranging from Gothic, ending with solar fields.
Also in the game there is a system of random events that happen from time to time
